def_cn: (烹饪前塞入鸡或辣椒等食物内的)填料
def_en: Stuffing is a mixture of food that is put inside a bird such as a chicken, or a vegetable such as a pepper, before it is cooked.
Stuffing is material that is used to fill things such as cushions or toys in order to make them firm or solid.

def_cn: 挫败…的锐气;使扫兴;使一蹶不振
def_en: If something knocks the stuffing out of you when you are feeling enthusiastic or confident about something, it causes you to lose your enthusiasm or confidence.
